requirements.summary: Display 'Founded by Abishek' credit in sidebar below NEXO AI wordmark and in the chat area welcome screen, styled consistently with the futuristic dark theme
acceptanceCriteria: The text 'Founded by Abishek' (or equivalent phrasing) appears in the sidebar below the NEXO AI wordmark
The founder credit also appears on the welcome/empty-state screen in the chat area
Styling is consistent with the existing futuristic dark theme (no jarring contrast or off-brand colors)
The founder text does not obstruct navigation or conversation list items in the sidebar

file_operations.description: Add a 'Founded by Abishek' credit line below the NEXO AI wordmark at the top of the sidebar. Style it with muted cyan/teal accent (text-cyan-400/60 or text-cyan-500/50) and smaller text size (text-xs or text-sm) to keep it subtle and non-obstructive. Ensure it does not interfere with the conversation list layout or collapsible sidebar behavior.

Add the founder attribution text 'Founded by Abishek' to the welcome/empty-state screen displayed when no conversation is selected. Place it below the existing feature cards or welcome message. Use consistent styling with the sidebar attribution (muted cyan/teal, smaller font size) to maintain visual cohesion with the dark futuristic theme.
